Kinetic Request v5.1
List of Third Party Software



Apache Commons Codec
Java encoding utilities.
Version 1.5
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://commons.apache.org/codec/


Apache Commons Discovery
Java library tools for locating resources by mapping service/reference names to
resource names.
Version 0.2
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://commons.apache.org/discovery/license.html
http://commons.apache.org/discovery/


Apache Commons IO
Collection of I/O utilities for Java
Version 1.2
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://commons.apache.org/io/


Apache Commons Lang
Package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy,
or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.
Version 3.1
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://commons.apache.org/lang/license.html
http://commons.apache.org/lang/


Apache Commons Logging
Java library that provides a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to
other, well known logging systems.
Version 1.1
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://commons.apache.org/logging/


Apache Commons FileUpload
File upload capability for Java servlets and web applications.
Version 1.2.1
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://commons.apache.org/fileupload/license.html
http://commons.apache.org/fileupload/


Apache Commons HttpClient
Java library for client-side HTTP communication.
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://projects.apache.org/projects/commons_httpclient.html


Apache Log4j
Logging library for Java.
Version 1.2.15
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/


Castor
Data binding framework for moving data from XML to Java objects
Version 1.0.5
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://castor.codehaus.org/license.html
http://castor.codehaus.org/index.html


JRuby
Ruby programming language on the JVM
Version 1.6.5
CPL/GPL/LGPL
https://github.com/jruby/jruby/blob/master/COPYING
http://jruby.org/


JSON Simple
Java toolkit for JSON.
Version 1.1
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://code.google.com/p/json-simple/


Xalan
Java XSLT processor for transforming XML documents.
Version 2.7.1
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/#license
http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/


Xerces
Java XML parser.
Version 2.10.0
Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
http://xerces.apache.org/xerces-j/


YUI
Javascript framework library.
Software License Agreement (BSD License)
Version 2.8.1
Copyright Â© 2012 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved.
BSD License
http://yuilibrary.com/license/
http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/2/
